attributes.action: sort out the postal system in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent postal strikes have caused unnecessary distruption to the general public and businesses of the UK.
As 100% owners of the Royal Mail, the Govenment should never have allowed the situation to reach a point where offical and unoffical strike action is necessary by the workers.
If the Govenment is to carry on with it's ownership of the Royal Mail then it needs to reaccess the management of the Royal Mail to ensure that the Royal Mail can and will serve the needs of the 60 million UK population.
If the Govenment is not capable of doing this then it should allow other companies to collect and deliver the post.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
